name: Velvet Vanilla Matcha
desc: A creamy blend of matcha green tea, vanilla bean syrup, and steamed oat milk, topped with a dusting of matcha powder. Perfect for when you need a smooth and energizing treat!

name: Peachy Pink Cloud
desc: A refreshing iced tea made with peach and hibiscus tea, shaken with coconut milk and a splash of white peach syrup. Served over ice with a light foam on top for a dreamy look.

name: Golden Glow Latte
desc: Turmeric chai tea with honey and steamed almond milk, sprinkled with cinnamon for a warm and cozy vibe. Great for feeling radiant inside and out.

name: Berry Bliss Breeze
desc: An iced tea refresher made with blackberry green tea, a splash of lemonade, and whole raspberries for garnish. Sweet, tangy, and perfect for sunny days.

name: Toasted Caramel Chai
desc: Classic chai tea latte with a swirl of caramel syrup, topped with whipped cream and caramel drizzle. It's like a hug in a cup with a hint of indulgence.

name: Citrus Spark Fizz
desc: A sparkling tea blend featuring Earl Grey, orange zest, and a splash of sparkling water, finished with a twist of lemon. Zesty and uplifting for midday pick-me-ups.

name: Minty Mocha Matcha
desc: A unique combo of matcha, a hint of mocha syrup, and frothy coconut milk, finished with a dash of crushed mint leaves. Refreshing yet decadent!

name: Tropical Twilight Tea
desc: A cold brew of passionfruit tea mixed with pineapple juice and a splash of pomegranate syrup, creating a layered sunset effect in your cup.

name: Lavender Dream Fog
desc: A calming lavender Earl Grey tea latte, infused with honey and steamed milk, topped with a sprinkle of dried lavender buds. This drink feels like a warm hug on a dreamy afternoon.

name: Raspberry Rose Glow
desc: A light and floral iced tea made with rosehip tea, raspberry syrup, and a splash of sparkling water, garnished with edible rose petals and fresh raspberries. Perfect for a refreshing pick-me-up with a luxurious touch.

name: Coconut Chai Bliss
desc: A tropical twist on a classic chai latte, made with spiced chai, creamy coconut milk, and a drizzle of caramel. Topped with toasted coconut flakes for a taste of the tropics.

name: Blueberry Citrus Sparkler
desc: A zesty and sparkling tea featuring a blend of blueberry green tea, fresh orange juice, and fizzy soda water, garnished with a twist of orange peel and fresh blueberries. A bright and energizing delight!
